text: Komban is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Mammy Century, starring Jagadish, Salim Kumar and Tosh Christy in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Tosh Christy as Krishnakumar/Kichen * Jagadish as Damodaran * Salim Kumar as Nanu *Salim Baba as Rajappan *Machan Varghese as Arumukhan *Mamukkoya as Pilla *Narayanankutty as Gopalan *Jaffer Idukki as Ayamootty *Shantha Kumari *Ancil - Cameo Appearance *Kaviyoor Ponnamma - Cameo Appearance *Spadikam George - Cameo Appearance ==References== ==External links== Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Komban (2007 film)
